short_description: cjl leisure is a motor homes, trailers & rvs dealer/rental services company based in weston-super-mare, united kingdom.
long_description: since its launch in 2016 cjl leisure vehicles has quickly earned a reputation for the highest quality van conversions. we are a certified motorhome qualified converter of vw commercial vehicles. tuv is a german brand synonymous with quality and safety. we have achieved iso9001 compliance. this ensures every vehicle produced attains the high standards we demand. we adhere to british & european standards for the leisure industry and work in accordance with bs en iso. cjl van conversions are recognised by a high street insurer. we work with several finance companies who can offer up to 10-years' finance making van goals an achievable reality. cjl have just transformed my works van into a fully carpet-lined stealth mode camper with interior lighting and charging points. brilliant conversion by cjl leisure. we've moved to bigger digs to accommodate our design studio, workshop & parts shop. we are qualified motorhome converters of vw commerial vehicles, tuv-approved, and have achieved european whole vehicle type approval, cop (conformity of production), and iso 9001 certification.
business_tags: ford transit custom | parts shop | online shopping | engineering and electrical | guarantee & warranty | campervan conversions | commercial vans | mechanical and electrical | motorhome insurance | vehicle warranty | motor vehicle | road bikes | fridges | vans product | road tests | interior and exterior | furniture set | interior lighting | camper conversions | wet rooms | iso 9001 | electrical specialists | quality engineering | design & development | produce & products | quality management system | website designing | studio workshops | crafters transition | solidworks
generated_description: cjl leisure, legally known as cjl leisure vehicles ltd., based in weston-super-mare, england, specializes in the conversion of commercial vans into leisure, sports, and commercial vehicles. established in 2016 by cye hayes, who previously held a senior position at bailey of bristol, the company is known for its high-quality conversions and adherence to rigorous safety standards. cjl leisure is a certified motorhome qualified converter of vw commercial vehicles and has achieved various approvals, including tuv, iso9001, and ewvta. the company employs a team of mechanical, electrical, and compliance engineers to ensure engineering excellence and customer satisfaction.
